## Checklist

- [ ] Anti-replay and idempotency behavior unchanged or explicitly improved
- [ ] Backward compatibility maintained (or migration notes provided)
- [ ] Tests added/updated and passing
- [ ] Security scans pass (`gosec`, `govulncheck`, `trivy` critical=0)
- [ ] Documentation updated (`README`, runbook, API docs if applicable)
